snippet.title: Mytheon : an Epic MMO-RPG (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Mytheon is a light MMO-RPG that combines elements of action RPGs and collectible card games. Create your avatar from one of three classes, collect stones of power, and explore 14 different adventure areas filled with epic encounters. Fight to your ultimate goal - defeat Zeus and the Greek pantheon of gods on Mount Olympus!

For more information, game media, and game features, visit the official Mytheon site at http://www.mytheon.com !

Mytheon is now available for download on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/413030
